The first half of the class uses the XRP robot, but the second half “builds” a West Coast chassis and then the students enter a small competition. The class is so popular I am adding a second one, but need more of the control parts. I am looking for 4 each: RoboRio 1.0, \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePDP\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"CTRE's Power Distribution Panel\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e 1.0 or equivalent, and OM5P radio.
